data.description: You are put in the [Riding: Horse-drawn Carriage] state. You can use EX power «Carriage Drive» and «Carriage Armor». Increase the rating of the barrier by «Carriage Armor» by +[INT base]. (CR26): You gain [Cancel (Attacks from a target not in riding state): 10] during the [Riding: Horse-drawn Carriage].
